page.title: 11Shops
page.content: {FRISBY POST OFFICE The Post Office is owned by Mr and Mrs Aylott who have two children,Mark and Nazarine.The Aylotts are kind about the sweets because they give a small sweet for nothing.The post arrives there about 7 a.m and is delivered in the village by Mrs.Proudman and Mrs.Aylott and to Rotherby by Mr Aylott. {FRISBY VILLAGE SHOP { }The village shop is owned by Mr and Mrs Carson. They have a child called Keiran.They sell drinks,lollipops, groceries,sweets,chocolates,fruit, and many more things.Newspapers are delivered from there by several paper boys.Mr.Carson also runs a mobile shop,which he takes to nearby villages. {KIRBY BELLARS POST OFFICE This is run just as a Post Office.
